snippet: Nice striker Mario Balotelli struck twice as the Ligue 1 leaders won 2-1 at home to Dijon on Sunday to widen the gap over third-placed champions Paris St Germain....
lead_paragraph: Nice striker Mario Balotelli struck twice as the Ligue 1 leaders won 2-1 at home to Dijon on Sunday to widen the gap over third-placed champions Paris St Germain.

headline.main: Balotelli Puts Nice Seven Points Clear of PSG, Monaco Lose
headline.print_headline: Balotelli Puts Nice Seven Points Clear of PSG, Monaco Lose
